fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Are polling stations organized to guarantee voters a secret, anonymous choice?

fxInfo_responses.value: No. Voters cannot make a secret, anonymous choice.
No. Some voters can make a secret, anonymous choice, but voting secrecy is in most instances violated.
Mixed. Voting secrecy and anonymity is assured to roughly the same extent as it is violated.
Yes. Most voters can make a secret, anonymous choice, but voting secrecy is in some instances violated.
Yes. All voters can make a secret, anonymous choice.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v3elecsedf
